name: ebt-agent-skills
description: Custom agent skills for code review, cleanup, and collaboration workflows.

plugins.name: cleanup-review
plugins.description: Review changed or staged code for structural cleanup: redundancy, dead code, rule violations, and low-value noise. Use when reviewing diffs, PRs, or modified files before commit. Reports findings only â€” does not apply changes unless explicitly instructed.

plugins.name: claude-subagent
plugins.description: Delegate self-contained subtasks to Claude Code via CLI for isolated execution, parallel work, and second-opinion analysis.

plugins.name: codex-subagent
plugins.description: Delegate self-contained subtasks to Codex CLI via subprocess execution (`codex exec` with optional `--full-auto`).

plugins.name: cursor-subagent
plugins.description: Delegate self-contained subtasks to Cursor Agent via CLI (`cursor-agent chat`) for isolated and parallel execution.

plugins.name: gemini-subagent
plugins.description: Delegate self-contained subtasks to Gemini CLI via CLI prompt execution for isolated and parallel execution.

plugins.name: contextual-investigator
plugins.description: Generates a thorough, read-only investigative report when analyzing bugs, unclear behavior, architectural confusion, or unexpected system states. Use when diagnosing issues or understanding complex code paths. Do NOT use for implementing fixes or making code changes.

plugins.name: release-notes
plugins.description: Generate release notes for a given release.
